GSD.description:
ax25: Fix UAF bugs in ax25 timers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.190 by commit a83a18c4c9033fb6604c587f52a2d78857cf0ac2. For more details please see the references link.
